title: Rich Italian tomato sauce
ingredients: ['1 finely chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, grated', '175 ml red wine (such as Merlot)', '1 tbsp dried basil', '1 tbsp dried oregano', 'Half tsp sugar', '1 tsp tomato ketchup', '1 tbsp tomato puree', '3 tins chopped or plum tomatoes', '1 tsp Italian mixed herbs', 'Level tsp salt', 'Level tsp ground black pepper', '2 tbsp olive oil']
